title: Recruiter
job_overview:
Recruiter Position Service Agreement 
Job Description: 
As a proud member of the Essential team, they are a positive representation of their company, by exhibiting the company's core values, following company standards, providing excellent service externally and internally. Providing daily support to company personnel by reviewing candidates thoroughly and setting up interviews properly. 

Duties and Responsibilities:
Posting hiring ads
Reviewing candidates daily 
Reaching out to candidates to qualify them by asking qualifying questions
Setting up interviews with dept heads at designated times 
Following up with dept heads to see how to proceed with candidates after interviews. 
Sending off and collecting requested onboarding documents for new hires to 
Perform any and all other tasks delegated by upper management.
